content: es tbl through back loop work row 1 an additional 10 times ws wrong side yo yarnover bind off on wrong side using stretchy method stretchy bind-off 1-1/2 in/ work 2 sts in pattern replace both sts on left needle 4 cm seaming edge 2 k2tog tbl work 1 st in pattern to end fasten_off note that cowl will be quite loose around the neck 36 in/91 5 cm a a n d d d in is g m re e p a e n a t t t s o o d f r a c p h e a r t a b d just size by omitting or 23 in/ increases 330 cm cast on edge/ neckline edge seaming edge 1 bind off edge 1-1/2 in/ direction of knitting 4 cm 32-1/2 in/82 5 cm empower lace - 1 rosemary romi hill the white and yellow shading in the charts marks off squares in increments of 5 going from right to left even numbered row wrongside row chart written instructions ktbl 7 times purl to 7 sts before end ktbl 7 times repeat area chart a - work 1 time shows only rs row 25 23 key to chart symbols 21 19 17 no stitch k2tog yo 15 13 11 k ssk sk2p 9 7 p k1 tbl m1 5 3 1 chart a alternate written instructions k2tog k1 k1 tbl 7 times row 17 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k1 yo k1 yo row 1 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl 7 times k2 k2tog k1 k1 tbl 7 times row 2 and all other ws row through 26 k1 tbl 7 times row 19 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo ssk k5 k2tog yo k1 purl to marker sl m k1 tbl 7 times k1 tbl 7 times row 3 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl 8 times row 21 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl yo ssk k3 row 5 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k1 k1 tbl 7 times k2tog yo k2 k1 tbl 7 times row 7 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k2 k1 tbl 7 times row 23 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k2 yo ssk k1 row 9 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k3 k1 tbl 7 times k2tog yo k3 k1 tbl 7 times row 11 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k4 k1 tbl 7 times row 25 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k4 yo sk2p row 13 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl yo k2 k2tog yo k4 k1 tbl 7 times k1 k1 tbl 7 times row 15 k1 tbl 7 times sl m yo k1 tbl k1 yo k2 27 sts chart b - work 6 times shows only rs row 19 17 15 13
